name: HKCategorySample
desc: A sample with values from a short list of possible values.

items.name: init(type: HKCategoryType, value: Int, start: Date, end: Date)
items.desc: Creates a newly instantiated category sample.

items.name: init(type: HKCategoryType, value: Int, start: Date, end: Date, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates a newly instantiated category sample with the provided metadata.

items.name: init(type: HKCategoryType, value: Int, start: Date, end: Date, device: HKDevice?, metadata: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Creates a newly instantiated category sample including the provided device and metadata.

items.name: var categoryType: HKCategoryType
items.desc: The category type for this sample.

items.name: var value: Int
items.desc: The category value for this sample.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValue
items.desc: Categories that are undefined.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueCervicalMucusQuality
items.desc: Categories that represent the user’s cervical mucus quality.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueMenstrualFlow
items.desc: Categories that indicate the amount of menstrual flow for a given sample.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueOvulationTestResult
items.desc: Categories that represent the result of an ovulation home test.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueContraceptive
items.desc: The type of contraceptive.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueSleepAnalysis
items.desc: Categories that represent the result of a sleep analysis.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueAppetiteChanges
items.desc: Categories that represent change in appetite.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValuePresence
items.desc: Categories that indicate whether a symptom is present.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueSeverity
items.desc: Categories that represent the severity of a symptom.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueEnvironmentalAudioExposureEvent
items.desc: Exposure events for environmental audio.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueHeadphoneAudioExposureEvent
items.desc: Exposure events for headphone audio.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueLowCardioFitnessEvent
items.desc: A value that indicates a low-level cardio fitness event.

items.name: enum HKAppleWalkingSteadinessClassification
items.desc: A classification of a score based on the steadiness of the user’s gait.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueAppleWalkingSteadinessEvent
items.desc: The value of an event triggered by a reduced score for the steadiness of the user’s gait.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValuePregnancyTestResult
items.desc: Category values that indicate the results of a home pregnancy test.

items.name: enum HKCategoryValueProgesteroneTestResult
items.desc: A category value that indicates the result from a home progesterone test.

items.name: let HKPredicateKeyPathCategoryValue: String
items.desc: The key path for accessing the category sample’s value.
